translations.name: The Breton Bible
translations.description: After the Catholic Church refused its publication it was eventually published in 1827 under the auspices of British and Foreign Bible Society, who had been lobbied to support Le Gonidec by the champion of Welsh language publications, Thomas Price (known as \\\"Carnhuanawc\\\"). The resulting \\\"Protestant\\\" translation was placed on the Index of Banned Books by the Catholic Church.
